scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && pnpm tsc -p tsconfig.json && pnpm tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && sh scripts/copyLocalProgramBinaries.sh
scripts.prepack: pnpm build && oclif manifest && oclif readme
scripts.kill: killall solana-test-validator || true && killall solana-test-val || true && sleep 1
scripts.test-cli: pnpm test-config && pnpm test-account && pnpm test-airdrop && pnpm test-compress && pnpm test-compress:sol && pnpm test-compress:spl && pnpm test-decompress && pnpm test-decompress:sol && pnpm test-decompress:spl && pnpm test-transfer && pnpm test-merkle-tree-authority && pnpm test-asset-pool && pnpm test-pool-type && pnpm test-merkle-tree && pnpm test-verifier && pnpm test-accept-utxos && pnpm kill
scripts.test-psp-add-program: cd ../psp-examples/tmp-test-psp  &&  ../../cli/test_bin/run psp:add-program --path "../../psp-template" --lspv "{ path = '../../../../programs/psp4in4out-app-storage', features = ['cpi'] }"  --m "{ path = '../../../../macros/light' }"  --lmtv "{ path = '../../../../programs/merkle-tree', features = ['cpi'] }" --vsdk "{ path = '../../../../verifier-sdk'}" added-psp && cd ../../cli && ts-node scripts/checkAddProgram.ts ../psp-examples/tmp-test-psp  added-psp
scripts.test-psp-init: cd ../psp-examples && rm -r tmp-test-psp || true && ../cli/test_bin/run psp:init --path "../psp-template" --zkjs "workspace:*" --ars "workspace:*" --pjs "workspace:*" --clib "workspace:*" --lspv "{ path = '../../../../programs/psp4in4out-app-storage', features = ['cpi'] }"  --m "{ path = '../../../../macros/light' }"  --lmtv "{ path = '../../../../programs/merkle-tree', features = ['cpi'] }" --vsdk "{ path = '../../../../verifier-sdk'}" tmp-test-psp && cd ../cli
scripts.test-psp-add-circuit: cd ../psp-examples/tmp-test-psp && ./../../cli/test_bin/run psp:add-circuit second-circuit --programName tmp-test-psp --path "../../psp-template"  --circom && ./../../cli/test_bin/run psp:add-circuit second-circuit1 --path "../../psp-template"  --programName tmp-test-psp  && cd ../../cli && ts-node scripts/checkAddCircuit.ts ../psp-examples/tmp-test-psp second-circuit tmp-test-psp true && ts-node scripts/checkAddCircuit.ts ../psp-examples/tmp-test-psp second-circuit1 tmp-test-psp
scripts.test-psp-build: cd ../psp-examples/tmp-test-psp && pnpm i --no-lockfile && ./../../cli/test_bin/run psp:build tmp-test-psp && cd ../../cli
scripts.test-psp: pnpm test-psp-init && pnpm test-psp-build && pnpm test-psp-test && pnpm test-psp-add-circuit
scripts.test-circom-init: cd ../psp-examples/ && rm -r tmp-test-circom || true && ./../cli/test_bin/run circom:init  tmp-test-circom --path "../psp-template" --ars "workspace:*" && cd ../cli
scripts.test-circom-add-circuit: cd ../psp-examples/tmp-test-circom && ./../../cli/test_bin/run circom:add-circuit second-circuit --programName tmp-test-circom --path "../../psp-template"  && cd ../../cli && ts-node scripts/checkAddCircuit.ts ../psp-examples/tmp-test-circom second-circuit tmp-test-circom true
scripts.test-circom-build: cd ../psp-examples/tmp-test-circom && pnpm i --no-lockfile && ./../../cli/test_bin/run circom:build tmp-test-circom && cd ../../cli
scripts.test-circom: pnpm test-circom-init && pnpm test-circom-build && pnpm test-circom-test && pnpm test-circom-add-circuit
scripts.test: pnpm kill && pnpm test-cli && pnpm test-psp && pnpm test-circom && pnpm test-utils
scripts.install-local: pnpm build && pnpm global remove @lightprotocol/cli || true && pnpm global add $PWD
